name: Workshop for introduction to programming at CWU Des Moines
body:
### Slides

 - [[Slides for the workshop|slides]]

### Programming resources

 - [Dive Into Python](http://www.diveintopython3.net/)
 - [Introducing Python](http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920028659.do)
 - [Software Carpentry](http://software-carpentry.org/)

### Data analysis resources

 - [Pandas documentation](http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/)
 - [Python for Data Analysis](http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920023784.do)
 - [Plotting in Python with matplotlib](http://matplotlib.org/)
 - [Plotting in Python with Seaborn](http://stanford.edu/~mwaskom/software/seaborn/)
